label: 釈迦八相
対訳語: Eight Events in the life of Sakyamuni
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Eight Events are (1) descending from the Tusita Heaven, (2) entering the womb, (3) leaving the womb, (4) taking reigious vows, (5) subjugating demons, (6) attaining enlightenment, (7) rolling the wheel of the dharma, and (8) entering parinirvāna.  (p. 513)
